name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
description: Foundational understanding of AWS Cloud, services, and terminology.

name: AWS Certified AI Practitioner
description: Foundational understanding of AI and ML concepts on AWS.

name: AWS Certified Developer – Associate
description: Developing and maintaining applications on AWS.

name: AWS Certified SysOps Administrator – Associate
description: Deploying, managing, and operating workloads on AWS.

name: AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate
description: Skills in data pipelines, monitoring, and troubleshooting.

name: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate
description: Building and deploying machine learning models on AWS.

name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Professional
description: Designing complex and scalable systems on AWS.

name: AWS Certified DevOps Engineer – Professional
description: Provisioning, operating, and managing distributed application systems.

name: AWS Certified Advanced Networking – Specialty
description: Designing and implementing AWS network architectures.

name: AWS Certified Security – Specialty
description: Securing data and workloads in the AWS Cloud.

name: AWS Certified Machine Learning – Specialty
description: Building, training, tuning, and deploying machine learning models.

name: Google Cloud Digital Leader
description: Foundational knowledge of Google Cloud services and how they support business.

name: Google Cloud Associate Cloud Engineer
description: Deploys applications, monitors operations, and manages enterprise solutions.

name: Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect
description: Enables organizations to leverage Google Cloud technologies.

name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900)
description: Foundational knowledge of cloud services and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.

name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Administrator Associate (AZ-104)
description: Subject matter expertise in implementing, managing, and monitoring an organization's Azure environment.

name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Solutions Architect Expert (AZ-305)
description: Designing cloud and hybrid solutions that run on Microsoft Azure.
